channel.title: Urban Soul Music Radio ~ Dj Buttnaked
channel.description: This is Soul Music Radio Aka Dj Buttnaked's podcast. Each week or at least everytime I update I will be playing today's tomorrows and yesterdays hottest soul, r&b, soulful house, deep groove and hip hop. We also spin independent artist as well so if you are a independent soul or hip hop artist wanting to get your music on the program hit us up at the email provided djbuttnaked@gmail.com with your mp3 file and a shout out to Soul Music Radio and Dj Buttnaked. If you hear a track and like it don’t hesitate to send us an email and we will let you know who it was or is. All request and comments about the show go directly to the d.j. who is on air at djbuttnaked@gmail.com Shows are usually updated weekly.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Come get down wit the get down!!!
channel.itunes:author: dj buttnaked

item.title: New Years mega mix
item.description: Your gonna dig this one. My homies DeeJay Tone, Dj Tre, Dj A-Ron all went hard in the paint on this mix with me. Enjoy
item.dc:creator: dj buttnaked
item.itunes:summary: Your gonna dig this one. My homies DeeJay Tone, Dj Tre, Dj A-Ron all went hard in the paint on this mix with me. Enjoy

item.title: Oh Soo Fresh ( DeeJay Tone Super Soul edition)
item.description: My brother DeeJay Tone was kind enough to lace us with some super hot fire this week! This was actually done a while back but it is still dope and guaranteed to get you moving on a Monday or anyday for that matter! Check out http://www.deejaytone.net/ for more information on him!!!!! October 14th is Oh Soo Fresh! Get there early!!!!!
item.dc:creator: dj buttnaked
item.itunes:summary:
My brother DeeJay Tone was kind enough to lace us with some super hot fire this week! This was actually done a while back but it is still dope and guaranteed to get you moving on a Monday or anyday for that matter!
Check out http://www.deejaytone.net/ for more information on him!!!!!
October 14th is Oh Soo Fresh! Get there early!!!!!

item.title: Oh Soo Fresh Mix Round 4 NINJAS!!
item.description: This is something to get you started for the weekend! Who luvs ya baby!
item.dc:creator: dj buttnaked
item.itunes:summary: This is something to get you started for the weekend! Who luvs ya baby!

item.title: Oh Soo Fresh (Round 2 Teaser) by DeeJay Tone
item.description: If you were not at the first installment of this party then you most certianly should make plans to get to the next one on August 12th! DeeJay Tone takes the gloves off for this one and well just say kills it! You can catch DeeJay Tone / Dj Estylz / and Dj Buttnaked all in the mix this Friday night at Club Contour for Oh Soo Fresh (Round 2) Bring your dancing shoes!
item.dc:creator: dj buttnaked
item.itunes:summary:
If you were not at the first installment of this party then you most certianly should make plans to get to the next one on August 12th!
DeeJay Tone takes the gloves off for this one and well just say kills it!
You can catch DeeJay Tone / Dj Estylz / and Dj Buttnaked all in the mix this Friday night at Club Contour for Oh Soo Fresh (Round 2)
Bring your dancing shoes!

item.title: Oh Soo Fresh (Chicago Style! With Dj Chemy K)
item.description: Keeping with the Oh Soo Fresh theme this week. Another one of my Oh Soo Fresh family members has dropped a stupid crazy dope mixtape! My sister Dj Chemy K comes at you from the windy city with this one. All I can say is this mix makes me feel good!! Roll down your windows turn your radio all the way up and get rockin! Now if only I could get her to rock with me at a gig sometime.... Hummmmm? Anyhoo check it out it's certified Fresh! Remember July 8th is coming quick! Oh Soo Fresh Friday's Live and direct at Club Contour Seattle WA Dj's : DeeJay Tone / Dj Buttnaked
item.dc:creator: dj buttnaked
